trans-unit.source: Sets the print settings for op . This is typically used to re-establish print settings from a previous print operation, see gtk_print_operation_run().
trans-unit.target: 设置 op 的打印设置。通常用于从先前的打印操作中重新建立打印设置，请参阅 gtk_print_operation_run() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the priority of a GtkTextTag. Valid priorities start at 0 and go to one less than gtk_text_tag_table_get_size(). Each tag in a table has a unique priority; setting the priority of one tag shifts the priorities of all the other tags in the table to maintain a unique priority for each tag. Higher priority tags “win” if two tags both set the same text attribute. When adding a tag to a tag table, it will be assigned the highest priority in the table by default; so normally the precedence of a set of tags is the order in which they were added to the table, or created with gtk_text_buffer_create_tag(), which adds the tag to the buffer’s table automatically.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkTextTag的优先级。有效优先级从0开始，比 gtk_text_tag_table_get_size() 小。表格中的每个标签都有唯一的优先级；设置一个标签的优先级会改变表中所有其他标签的优先级，从而为每个标签保持唯一的优先级。如果两个标签都设置了相同的文本属性，则优先级较高的标签“获胜”。将标签添加到标签表时，默认情况下，该标签将在表中分配最高优先级；因此，通常一组标签的优先级是将它们添加到表中的顺序，或者是使用 gtk_text_buffer_create_tag() 创建的顺序，后者会自动将标签添加到缓冲区的表中。

trans-unit.source: Sets the propagation phase at which a controller handles events.
trans-unit.target: 设置控制器处理事件的传播阶段。

trans-unit.source: Sets the reading direction on a particular widget. This direction controls the primary direction for widgets containing text, and also the direction in which the children of a container are packed. The ability to set the direction is present in order so that correct localization into languages with right-to-left reading directions can be done. Generally, applications will let the default reading direction present, except for containers where the containers are arranged in an order that is explicitly visual rather than logical (such as buttons for text justification).
trans-unit.target: 设置特定小组件的阅读方向。该方向控制包含文本的小组件的主要方向,也控制容器的子控件的包装方向。设置方向的能力是为了使正确的本地化为从右到左的阅读方向的语言。一般来说,应用程序会让默认的阅读方向存在,除非容器的排列顺序是明确的可视化而不是逻辑性的(例如用于文本公正的按钮)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the rectangle that popover will point to, in the coordinate space of the popover parent.
trans-unit.target: 设置矩形 popover 将指向，在坐标空间 popover 父母。

trans-unit.source: Sets the renderer size to be explicit, independent of the properties set.
trans-unit.target: 将渲染器的大小设置为显式,与设置的属性无关。

trans-unit.source: Sets the renderer’s alignment within its available space.
trans-unit.target: 在其可用空间内设置渲染器的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the renderer’s padding.
trans-unit.target: 设置渲染器的填充。

trans-unit.source: Sets the required version of OpenGL to be used when creating the context for the widget.
trans-unit.target: 设置为小组件创建上下文时要使用的 OpenGL 的必要版本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the resource paths that will be looked at when looking for icons, similar to search paths.
trans-unit.target: 设置在查找图标时要查找的资源路径,类似于搜索路径。

trans-unit.source: Sets the right margin of the GtkPageSetup.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkPageSetup的右边距。

trans-unit.source: Sets the row of the model that is currently displayed by the GtkCellView. If the path is unset, then the contents of the cellview “stick” at their last value; this is not normally a desired result, but may be a needed intermediate state if say, the model for the GtkCellView becomes temporarily empty.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkCellView当前显示的模型行。如果未设置路径，则单元格视图的内容将“停留”在其最后一个值；这通常不是期望的结果，但是如果说GtkCellView的模型暂时为空，则可能是必需的中间状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets the row separator function, which is used to determine whether a row should be drawn as a separator. If the row separator function is NULL, no separators are drawn. This is the default value.
trans-unit.target: 设置行分隔符功能，该功能用于确定是否应将行绘制为分隔符。如果行分隔符函数为 NULL ，则不绘制分隔符。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the row that is highlighted for feedback. If path is NULL, an existing highlight is removed.
trans-unit.target: 设置突出显示以供反馈的行。如果 path 为 NULL ，那么将删除现有的突出显示。

trans-unit.source: Sets the row to place child in.
trans-unit.target: 设置要放置 child 的行。

trans-unit.source: Sets the scale for this job (where 1.0 means unscaled).
trans-unit.target: 设置该作业的比例尺(其中 1.0 表示未缩放)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the scale to use when getting image assets for the style.
trans-unit.target: 设置获取样式的图像资产时要使用的比例。

trans-unit.source: Sets the scope the builder should operate in.
trans-unit.target: 设置生成器的操作范围。

trans-unit.source: Sets the scrollbar policy for the horizontal and vertical scrollbars.
trans-unit.target: 设置水平和垂直滚动条的滚动条策略。

trans-unit.source: Sets the search path for the icon theme object. When looking for an icon theme, GTK will search for a subdirectory of one or more of the directories in path with the same name as the icon theme containing an index.theme file. (Themes from multiple of the path elements are combined to allow themes to be extended by adding icons in the user’s home directory.)
trans-unit.target: 设置图标主题对象的搜索路径。查找图标主题时，GTK将在 path 与包含index.theme文件的图标主题同名的目录中搜索一个或多个目录的子目录。（来自多个路径元素的主题组合在一起，以允许通过在用户的主目录中添加图标来扩展主题。）

trans-unit.source: Sets the secondary text of the message dialog to be message_format (with printf()-style), which is marked up with the Pango text markup language.
trans-unit.target: 将消息对话框的辅助文本设置为 message_format （具有 printf() -style），并使用Pango文本标记语言对其进行标记。

trans-unit.source: Sets the secondary text of the message dialog to be message_format (with printf()-style).
trans-unit.target: 将消息对话框的辅助文本设置为 message_format （使用 printf() -style）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the selection function.
trans-unit.target: 设置选择功能。

trans-unit.source: Sets the selection mode of the icon_view .
trans-unit.target: 设置 icon_view 的选择模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the selection mode of the selection . If the previous type was GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE, then the anchor is kept selected, if it was previously selected.
trans-unit.target: 设置的选择模式 selection 。如果先前的类型是GTK_SELECTION_MULTIPLE，则锚点将保持选中状态（如果先前已选择）。

trans-unit.source: Sets the sensitivity for the specified icon.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定图标的灵敏度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the sensitivity of a widget. A widget is sensitive if the user can interact with it. Insensitive widgets are “grayed out” and the user can’t interact with them. Insensitive widgets are known as “inactive”, “disabled”, or “ghosted” in some other toolkits.
trans-unit.target: 设置小部件的灵敏度。如果用户可以与小部件交互，则该小部件是敏感的。不敏感的窗口小部件“显示为灰色”，用户无法与它们进行交互。不敏感的小部件在某些其他工具箱中被称为“不活动”，“禁用”或“重影”。

trans-unit.source: Sets the side for self , determining which part of decoration layout it uses.
trans-unit.target: 设置 self 的一面，确定它使用装饰布局的哪一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the sort model to do an incremental sort.
trans-unit.target: 设置排序模型为增量排序。

trans-unit.source: Sets the sorter to use for items with the same parent.
trans-unit.target: 设置分拣器用于具有相同父项目的项目。

trans-unit.source: Sets the sorting of the view.
trans-unit.target: 设置视图的排序。

trans-unit.source: Sets the spacing field of tree_column , which is the number of pixels to place between cell renderers packed into it.
trans-unit.target: 设置 tree_column 的间隔字段，该间隔字段是打包到其中的单元格渲染器之间放置的像素数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the spacing to add between cell renderers in box .
trans-unit.target: 设置 box 中要在单元格渲染器之间添加的间隔。

trans-unit.source: Sets the stack to control.
trans-unit.target: 将堆栈设置为控制。

trans-unit.source: Sets the start child of paned to child .
trans-unit.target: 将 paned 的起始子对象设置为 child 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the start margin of widget . See the “margin-start” property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 widget 的开始边距。请参见“ margin-start”属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the start widget. To remove the existing start widget, pass NULL.
trans-unit.target: 设置开始小部件。要删除现有的启动小部件，请传递 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of sequence in gesture . Sequences start in state GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_NONE, and whenever they change state, they can never go back to that state. Likewise, sequences in state GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_DENIED cannot turn back to a not denied state. With these rules, the lifetime of an event sequence is constrained to the next four:
trans-unit.target: 设置的状态 sequence 中 gesture 。序列从状态GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_NONE开始，并且每当它们更改状态时，就永远不会回到该状态。同样，处于状态GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_DENIED的序列不能转回未拒绝状态。使用这些规则，事件序列的生存期被限制为接下来的四个：

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of all sequences that gesture is currently interacting with. See gtk_gesture_set_sequence_state() for more details on sequence states.
trans-unit.target: 设置 gesture 当前正在与之交互的所有序列的状态。有关序列状态的更多详细信息，请参见 gtk_gesture_set_sequence_state() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the state of the expander. Set to TRUE, if you want the child widget to be revealed, and FALSE if you want the child widget to be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 设置扩展器的状态。如果要显示子窗口小部件，则设置为 TRUE ，如果要隐藏子窗口小部件，则设置为 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the state to be used for style matching.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于样式匹配的状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets the status of the toggle button. Set to TRUE if you want the GtkToggleButton to be “pressed in”, and FALSE to raise it.
trans-unit.target: 设置切换按钮的状态。设置为 TRUE ，如果你想在GtkToggleButton“压在”，并 FALSE 以提高它。

trans-unit.source: Sets the step and page increments for spin_button. This affects how quickly the value changes when the spin button’s arrows are activated.
trans-unit.target: 设置spin_button的步长和页面增量。这会影响激活旋转按钮的箭头时值变化的速度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the step and page sizes for the range. The step size is used when the user clicks the GtkScrollbar arrows or moves GtkScale via arrow keys. The page size is used for example when moving via Page Up or Page Down keys.
trans-unit.target: 设置范围的步长和页面大小。当用户单击GtkScrollbar箭头或通过箭头键移动GtkScale时，将使用步长。例如，当通过Page Up或Page Down键移动时，将使用页面大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the step increment of the adjustment.
trans-unit.target: 设置调整的步长。

trans-unit.source: Sets the stream that is controlled by controls .
trans-unit.target: 设置由 controls 的流。

trans-unit.source: Sets the strength of the constraint on the natural size of the given GtkConstraintGuide.
trans-unit.target: 设置对给定GtkConstraintGuide的自然大小的约束的强度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the string to search for.
trans-unit.target: 设置要搜索的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the strings which are displayed in the artists tab of the secondary credits dialog.
trans-unit.target: 设置二级字幕对话框的艺术家选项卡中显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the strings which are displayed in the authors tab of the secondary credits dialog.
trans-unit.target: 设置二级字幕对话框的作者选项卡中显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the strings which are displayed in the documenters tab of the credits dialog.
trans-unit.target: 设置在学分对话框的文档标签中显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the style of the button.
trans-unit.target: 设置按钮的样式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the style of the button. Buttons can has a flat appearance or have a frame drawn around them.
trans-unit.target: 设置按钮的样式。按钮可以是平坦的,也可以在其周围绘制一个框架。

trans-unit.source: Sets the supported GTypes for this drop target.
trans-unit.target: 设置此投放目标所支持的GT类型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the system information to be displayed in the about dialog. If system_information is NULL, the system information tab is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 设置要在About对话框中显示的系统信息。如果 system_information 为 NULL ，则隐藏系统信息选项卡。

trans-unit.source: Sets the target of an actionable widget.
trans-unit.target: 设置可操作小组件的目标。

trans-unit.source: Sets the target value of an actionable widget.
trans-unit.target: 设置可操作小组件的目标值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text displayed in the preview area. The text is used to show how the selected font looks.
trans-unit.target: 设置在预览区域中显示的文本。该 text 是用来展示如何选择的字体看起来。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 设置缓冲区中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text in the editable to the given value, replacing the current contents.
trans-unit.target: 将可编辑的文本设置为给定值,替换当前内容。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text of self . If “use-underline” is TRUE, the underscore in label is interpreted as mnemonic indicator, see gtk_check_button_set_use_underline() for details on this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 设置 self 的文本。如果“ use-underline”为 TRUE ，则 label 的下划线将被解释为助记符，有关此行为的详细信息，请参见 gtk_check_button_set_use_underline() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text of the label of the button to label .
trans-unit.target: 将按钮 label 的文本设置为label。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text of the label of the expander to label .
trans-unit.target: 将扩展器的标签文本设置为 label 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text of the label. The label is interpreted as including embedded underlines and/or Pango markup depending on the values of the “use-underline” and “use-markup” properties.
trans-unit.target: 设置标签的文本。根据“ use-underline”和“ use-markup”属性的值，标签被解释为包括嵌入的下划线和/或Pango标记。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text of the message dialog to be str , which is marked up with the Pango text markup language.
trans-unit.target: 将消息对话框的文本设置为 str ，使用Pango文本标记语言对其进行标记。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text of the tooltip to be markup , which is marked up with the Pango text markup language. If markup is NULL, the label will be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 将工具提示的文本设置为 markup ，使用Pango文本标记语言对其进行标记。如果 markup 为 NULL ，则标签将被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text of the tooltip to be text . If text is NULL, the label will be hidden. See also gtk_tooltip_set_markup().
trans-unit.target: 将工具提示的文本设置为 text 。如果 text 为 NULL ，则标签将被隐藏。另请参见 gtk_tooltip_set_markup() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text of tooltip to be the given string, which is marked up with the Pango text markup language. Also see gtk_tooltip_set_markup().
trans-unit.target: 将工具提示的文本设置为给定的字符串，并使用Pango文本标记语言对其进行标记。另请参见 gtk_tooltip_set_markup() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text of tooltip to be the given string.
trans-unit.target: 将工具提示的文字设置为给定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text that is shown if there are not applications that can handle the content type.
trans-unit.target: 设置没有能够处理内容类型的应用程序时显示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text to be displayed by self when no accelerator is set.
trans-unit.target: 设置未设置加速器时 self 显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text to display at the top of the dialog. If the heading is not set, the dialog displays a default text.
trans-unit.target: 设置要显示在对话框顶部的文字。如果未设置标题,则对话框会显示默认文本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the text within the GtkLabel widget. It overwrites any text that was there before.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkLabel小部件内的文本。它会覆盖之前的所有文本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the tip area of tooltip to be the area covered by the item at path . See also gtk_icon_view_set_tooltip_column() for a simpler alternative. See also gtk_tooltip_set_tip_area().
trans-unit.target: 将 tooltip 的笔尖区域设置为 path 该项所覆盖的区域。另请参阅 gtk_icon_view_set_tooltip_column() 以获得更简单的选择。另请参见 gtk_tooltip_set_tip_area() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the tip area of tooltip to be the area covered by the row at path . See also gtk_tree_view_set_tooltip_column() for a simpler alternative. See also gtk_tooltip_set_tip_area().
trans-unit.target: 将 tooltip 的笔尖区域设置为 path 处的行所覆盖的区域。另请参见 gtk_tree_view_set_tooltip_column() 。另请参见 gtk_tooltip_set_tip_area() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the tip area of tooltip to the area path , column and cell have in common. For example if path is NULL and column is set, the tip area will be set to the full area covered by column . See also gtk_tooltip_set_tip_area().
trans-unit.target: 将 tooltip 的提示区域设置为区域 path ， column 和 cell 共有的区域。例如，如果 path 为 NULL 且设置了 column ，则提示区域将设置为 column 覆盖的整个区域。另请参见 gtk_tooltip_set_tip_area() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the tip area of tooltip to the area which cell occupies in the item pointed to by path . See also gtk_tooltip_set_tip_area().
trans-unit.target: 将 tooltip 的提示区域设置为 path 指向的项目中 cell 占据的区域。另请参见 gtk_tooltip_set_tip_area() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the title for the GtkHeaderBar.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkHeaderBar的标题。

trans-unit.source: Sets the title for the color selection dialog.
trans-unit.target: 设置颜色选择对话框的标题。

trans-unit.source: Sets the title for the font chooser dialog.
trans-unit.target: 设置字体选择器对话框的标题。

trans-unit.source: Sets the title of the GtkNativeDialog.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkNativeDialog的标题。

trans-unit.source: Sets the title of the GtkWindow. The title of a window will be displayed in its title bar; on the X Window System, the title bar is rendered by the window manager, so exactly how the title appears to users may vary according to a user’s exact configuration. The title should help a user distinguish this window from other windows they may have open. A good title might include the application name and current document filename, for example. document filename, for example.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkWindow的标题。窗口的标题将显示在其标题栏中。在X Window系统上，标题栏是由窗口管理器呈现的，因此标题对用户的显示方式可能会根据用户的确切配置而有所不同。标题应有助于用户将该窗口与他们可能已打开的其他窗口区分开。例如，一个好的标题可能包括应用程序名称和当前文档的文件名。例如，文档文件名。

trans-unit.source: Sets the title of the tree_column . If a custom widget has been set, then this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 设置 tree_column 的标题。如果设置了自定义窗口小部件，那么将忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the title of this column. The title is displayed in the header of a GtkColumnView for this column and is therefore user-facing text that should be translated.
trans-unit.target: 设置此列的标题。标题显示在此列的GtkColumnView的标题中，因此是应翻译的面向用户的文本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the top margin for text in text_view .
trans-unit.target: 设置 text_view 中文本的上边距。

trans-unit.source: Sets the top margin of widget . See the “margin-top” property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 widget 的上边距。请参见“ margin-top”属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the top margin of the GtkPageSetup.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkPageSetup的上边距。

trans-unit.source: Sets the transformation for widget .
trans-unit.target: 设置 widget 的转换。

trans-unit.source: Sets the transformation of the child of a GtkFixedLayout.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkFixedLayout的子级的转换。

trans-unit.source: Sets the transient parent for windows shown by the GtkMountOperation.
trans-unit.target: 为GtkMountOperation显示的窗口设置瞬态父级。

trans-unit.source: Sets the translation domain of builder . See “translation-domain”.
trans-unit.target: 设置 builder 的翻译域。请参阅“翻译域”。

trans-unit.source: Sets the translator credits string which is displayed in the translators tab of the secondary credits dialog.
trans-unit.target: 设置在二级字幕对话框的译者标签中显示的译者字幕字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the tree list row that this expander should manage.
trans-unit.target: 设置该扩展器应管理的树形列表行。

trans-unit.source: Sets the type of animation that will be used for transitions between pages in stack . Available types include various kinds of fades and slides.
trans-unit.target: 设置将用于 stack 页面之间过渡的动画类型。可用的类型包括各种淡入淡出和滑动。

trans-unit.source: Sets the type of animation that will be used for transitions in revealer . Available types include various kinds of fades and slides.
trans-unit.target: 设置将用于 revealer 过渡的动画类型。可用的类型包括各种淡入淡出和滑动。

trans-unit.source: Sets the type of operation that the chooser is performing; the user interface is adapted to suit the selected action. For example, an option to create a new folder might be shown if the action is GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_SAVE but not if the action is GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_OPEN.
trans-unit.target: 设置选择器正在执行的操作类型；用户界面适用于选定的操作。例如，可能会显示创建一个新的文件夹选项如果操作 GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_SAVE 但如果动作是 GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_OPEN 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the type to be used for creating layout managers for widgets of widget_class . The given type must be a subtype of GtkLayoutManager.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于为 widget_class 的小部件创建布局管理器的类型。给定的 type 必须是GtkLayoutManager的子类型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the underlying state of the GtkSwitch.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkSwitch的基础状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets the update behavior of a spin button. This determines whether the spin button is always updated or only when a valid value is set.
trans-unit.target: 设置自旋按钮的更新行为。这决定了自旋按钮是一直更新还是只在设置有效值时更新。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_COLLATE.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_COLLATE 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_DEFAULT_SOURCE.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_DEFAULT_SOURCE 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_DITHER.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_DITHER 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_DUPLEX.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_DUPLEX 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_FINISHINGS.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_FINISHINGS 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_MEDIA_TYPE.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_MEDIA_TYPE 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_N_COPIES.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_N_COPIES 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_NUMBER_UP_LAYOUT.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_NUMBER_UP_LAYOUT 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_NUMBER_UP.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_NUMBER_UP 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_ORIENTATION.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_ORIENTATION 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_OUTPUT_BIN.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_OUTPUT_BIN 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAGE_RANGES.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAGE_RANGES 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAGE_SET.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAGE_SET 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_FORMAT, GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_WIDTH and GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_HEIGHT.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_FORMAT ， GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_WIDTH 和 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_HEIGHT 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_HEIGHT.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_HEIGHT 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_WIDTH.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PAPER_WIDTH 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PRINT_PAGES.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PRINT_PAGES 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PRINTER_LPI.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_PRINTER_LPI 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_QUALITY.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_QUALITY 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_REVERSE.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_REVERSE 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_SCALE.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_SCALE 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_USE_COLOR.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_USE_COLOR 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of spin_button .
trans-unit.target: 设置 spin_button 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of one or more cells in the row referenced by iter . The variable argument list should contain integer column numbers, each column number followed by the value to be set. The list is terminated by a -1. For example, to set column 0 with type G_TYPE_STRING to “Foo”, you would write gtk_list_store_set (store, iter, 0, "Foo", -1).
trans-unit.target: 设置 iter 引用的行中一个或多个单元格的值。变量参数列表应包含整数列号，每个列号后跟要设置的值。该列表以-1终止。例如，要将类型为 G_TYPE_STRING 的第0列设置为“ Foo”，则应编写 gtk_list_store_set (store, iter, 0, "Foo", -1) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of one or more cells in the row referenced by iter . The variable argument list should contain integer column numbers, each column number followed by the value to be set. The list is terminated by a -1. For example, to set column 0 with type G_TYPE_STRING to “Foo”, you would write gtk_tree_store_set (store, iter, 0, "Foo", -1).
trans-unit.target: 设置 iter 引用的行中一个或多个单元格的值。变量参数列表应包含整数列号，每个列号后跟要设置的值。该列表以-1终止。例如，要将类型 G_TYPE_STRING 的第0列设置为“ Foo”，则应编写 gtk_tree_store_set (store, iter, 0, "Foo", -1) 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the “inverted” property.
trans-unit.target: 设置“ inverted”属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the “max-value” property.
trans-unit.target: 设置“最大值”属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the “min-value” property.
trans-unit.target: 设置“最小值”属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the “mode” property.
trans-unit.target: 设置“ mode”属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the “value” property.
trans-unit.target: 设置“值”属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the values of GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_RESOLUTION, GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_RESOLUTION_X and GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_RESOLUTION_Y.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_RESOLUTION ， GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_RESOLUTION_X 和 GTK_PRINT_SETTINGS_RESOLUTION_Y 的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the version string to display in the about dialog.
trans-unit.target: 设置要在关于对话框中显示的版本字符串。

trans-unit.source: Sets the vertical adjustment of the GtkScrollable.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkScrollable的垂直调整。

trans-unit.source: Sets the vertical alignment of widget . See the “valign” property.
trans-unit.target: 设置 widget 的垂直对齐方式。请参见“ valign”属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the vertical alignment of the child within the allocation of the GtkAspectFrame.
trans-unit.target: 在GtkAspectFrame的分配范围内设置子项的垂直对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: Sets the vertical space to add between children. See the “row-spacing” property.
trans-unit.target: 设置要在子级之间添加的垂直空间。请参阅“行间距”属性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the visibility of mark ; the insertion point is normally visible, i.e. you can see it as a vertical bar. Also, the text widget uses a visible mark to indicate where a drop will occur when dragging-and-dropping text. Most other marks are not visible. Marks are not visible by default.
trans-unit.target: 设置 mark 的可见性; 插入点通常是可见的，即您可以将其视为竖线。此外，文本小部件使​​用可见标记来指示拖放文本时将在何处发生放置。其他大多数标记都不可见。默认情况下，标记是不可见的。

trans-unit.source: Sets the visibility of tree_column .
trans-unit.target: 设置 tree_column 的可见性。

trans-unit.source: Sets the visibility state of widget . Note that setting this to TRUE doesn’t mean the widget is actually viewable, see gtk_widget_get_visible().
trans-unit.target: 设置 widget 的可见性状态。请注意，将此设置为 TRUE 并不意味着该窗口小部件实际上是可见的，请参见 gtk_widget_get_visible() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the visibility state of the headers.
trans-unit.target: 设置标题的可见性状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets the visible function used when filtering the filter to be func . The function should return TRUE if the given row should be visible and FALSE otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 将过滤 filter 时使用的可见函数设置为 func 。如果给定的行应该可见，则该函数应返回 TRUE ,否则返回 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the volume of the audio stream. This function call will work even if the stream is muted.
trans-unit.target: 设置音频流的音量。即使流媒体处于静音状态,该函数调用也会发挥作用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the widget in the header to be widget . If widget is NULL, then the header button is set with a GtkLabel set to the title of tree_column .
trans-unit.target: 将标题中的小部件设置为 widget 。如果widget为 NULL ，则设置标题按钮，并将GtkLabel设置为 tree_column 的标题。

trans-unit.source: Sets the widget that should be observed.
trans-unit.target: 设置应该观察的小组件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the widget to display as the drag icon.
trans-unit.target: 设置小组件显示为拖动图标。

trans-unit.source: Sets up a delegate for GtkEditable, assuming that the get_delegate vfunc in the GtkEditable interface has been set up for the editable 's type.
trans-unit.target: 为GtkEditable设置一个委托，假设已经为 editable 类型设置了GtkEditable接口中的get_delegate vfunc。

trans-unit.source: Sets up the GtkPrintOperation to generate a file instead of showing the print dialog. The intended use of this function is for implementing “Export to PDF” actions. Currently, PDF is the only supported format.
trans-unit.target: 将GtkPrintOperation设置为生成文件，而不显示打印对话框。此功能的预期用途是用于实现“导出为PDF”操作。当前，PDF是唯一受支持的格式。

trans-unit.source: Sets up the GtkPrintOperation to wait for calling of gtk_print_operation_draw_page_finish() from application. It can be used for drawing page in another thread.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkPrintOperation以等待从应用程序调用 gtk_print_operation_draw_page_finish() 。它可以用于在另一个线程中绘制页面。

trans-unit.source: Sets up the icon at the given position so that GTK will start a drag operation when the user clicks and drags the icon.
trans-unit.target: 在给定的位置设置图标,这样当用户点击并拖动图标时,GTK将开始拖动操作。

trans-unit.source: Sets up the transformation for the cairo context obtained from GtkPrintContext in such a way that distances are measured in units of unit .
trans-unit.target: 设置从GtkPrintContext获得的cairo上下文的转换，以使距离以unit为 unit 进行度量。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether cell_view should draw all of its cells in a sensitive state, this is used by GtkComboBox menus to ensure that rows with insensitive cells that contain children appear sensitive in the parent menu item.
trans-unit.target: 设置 cell_view 是否应以敏感状态绘制其所有单元格，GtkComboBox菜单使用此菜单项来确保具有不敏感单元格的包含子级的行在父菜单项中显示为敏感状态。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether cell_view should request space to fit the entire GtkTreeModel.
trans-unit.target: 设置 cell_view 是否应请求空间以适合整个GtkTreeModel。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether gesture is exclusive. An exclusive gesture will only handle pointer and "pointer emulated" touch events, so at any given time, there is only one sequence able to interact with those.
trans-unit.target: 设置 gesture 是否排他。排他性手势将仅处理指针和“指针仿真”触摸事件，因此在任何给定时间，只有一个序列能够与它们交互。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether page contents are complete.
trans-unit.target: 设置 page 内容是否完整。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether popover is modal.
trans-unit.target: 设置 popover 是否为模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether self automatically starts playback when it becomes visible or when a new file gets loaded.
trans-unit.target: 设置当 self 变得可见或加载新文件时是否自动开始播放。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether widget can be the target of pointer events.
trans-unit.target: 设置 widget 是否可以成为指针事件的目标。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether widget is included in the measured size of overlay .
trans-unit.target: 设置 widget 是否包括在所测量的 overlay 大小中。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether widget should be clipped within the parent.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应将 widget 剪切在父级中。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether widget should be mapped along with its when its parent is mapped and widget has been shown with gtk_widget_show().
trans-unit.target: 设置在映射 widget 的父 widget 并且已使用 gtk_widget_show() 显示窗口小部件时是否应该对其进行映射。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether Emoji completion is enabled. If it is, typing ':', followed by a recognized keyword, will pop up a window with suggested Emojis matching the keyword.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否启用Emoji完成。如果启用,输入':',然后输入一个识别的关键字,将弹出一个窗口,显示与关键字匹配的建议表情符号。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether a bevel will be drawn around the notebook pages. This only has a visual effect when the tabs are not shown. See gtk_notebook_set_show_tabs().
trans-unit.target: 设置是否在笔记本页面上绘制斜角。仅在未显示选项卡时才具有视觉效果。请参阅 gtk_notebook_set_show_tabs() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether a graphical fill level is show on the trough. See gtk_range_set_fill_level() for a general description of the fill level concept.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否在槽上显示图形填充水平。有关填充级别概念的一般说明，请参见 gtk_range_set_fill_level() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether a search entry will be shown in the popup that allows to search for items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 设置搜索条目是否会显示在允许搜索列表中的项目的弹窗中。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether a selection exists.
trans-unit.target: 设置选择是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether all columns of grid should have the same width.
trans-unit.target: 设置 grid 所有列是否应具有相同的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether all columns of grid will have the same width.
trans-unit.target: 设置 grid 所有列是否具有相同的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether all rows of grid should have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 设置 grid 所有行是否应具有相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether all rows of grid will have the same height.
trans-unit.target: 设置 grid 所有行是否具有相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether columns should be reorderable by dragging.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以通过拖动对列进行重新排序。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether file chooser will offer to create new folders. This is only relevant if the action is not set to be GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_OPEN.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件选择器是否提供创建新文件夹的功能。仅当操作未设置为 GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_OPEN 时,这才有意义。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether it is possible to cycle through the possible completions inside the entry.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以在条目内循环浏览可能的完成。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether items should be activated on single click and selected on hover.
trans-unit.target: 设置项目是否应在单次点击时激活和在悬停时选择。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether multiple files can be selected in the file selector. This is only relevant if the action is set to be GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_OPEN or GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_SELECT_FOLDER.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以在文件选择器中选择多个文件。仅当操作设置为 GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_OPEN 或 GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_SELECT_FOLDER 时,这才有意义。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether new files loaded by self should be set to loop.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应将 self 加载的新文件设置为循环。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not stack will interpolate its size when changing the visible child. If the “interpolate-size” property is set to TRUE, stack will interpolate its size between the current one and the one it'll take after changing the visible child, according to the set transition duration.
trans-unit.target: 设置更改可见子项时 stack 是否将内插其大小。如果将“ interpolate-size”属性设置为 TRUE ，则 stack 将根据设置的过渡持续时间在当前尺寸与更改可见子级后将使用的尺寸之间进行插值。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not the color chooser should use the alpha channel.
trans-unit.target: 设置颜色选择器是否应该使用alpha通道。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether or not to enable undoable actions in the text buffer. If enabled, the user will be able to undo the last number of actions up to gtk_text_buffer_get_max_undo_levels().
trans-unit.target: 设置是否在文本缓冲区中启用可撤消操作。如果启用，则用户将能够撤消直到 gtk_text_buffer_get_max_undo_levels() 为止的最后一次操作。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether rows should be activated on single click and selected on hover.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否在单次点击时激活行并在悬停时选择行。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether selection is supported by GtkPrintOperation.
trans-unit.target: 设置GtkPrintOperation是否支持选择。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether selections can be changed by dragging with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否可以用鼠标拖动来改变选区。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the gtk_print_operation_run() may return before the print operation is completed. Note that some platforms may not allow asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 设置 gtk_print_operation_run() 在打印操作完成之前是否可以返回。请注意，某些平台可能不允许异步操作。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the area should create an OpenGL or an OpenGL ES context.
trans-unit.target: 设置 area 应创建OpenGL还是OpenGL ES上下文。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the GtkText should grow and shrink with the content.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GtkText 是否应该随着内容的增长和缩小。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the GtkText should truncate multi-line text that is pasted into the widget.
trans-unit.target: 设置 GtkText 是否应该截断粘贴到小组件中的多行文本。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the IM context should use the preedit string to display feedback. If use_preedit is FALSE (default is TRUE), then the IM context may use some other method to display feedback, such as displaying it in a child of the root window.
trans-unit.target: 设置IM上下文是否应使用preedit字符串显示反馈。如果 use_preedit 为FALSE（默认值为TRUE），则IM上下文可以使用其他方法来显示反馈，例如在根窗口的子级中显示它。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the app chooser should show all applications in a flat list.
trans-unit.target: 设置应用程序选择器是否应在平面列表中显示所有应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the app chooser should show applications which are unrelated to the content type.
trans-unit.target: 设置应用程序选择器是否应该显示与内容类型无关的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the app chooser should show recommended applications for the content type in a separate section.
trans-unit.target: 设置应用程序选择器是否应该在单独的部分显示内容类型的推荐应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the app chooser should show related applications for the content type in a separate section.
trans-unit.target: 设置应用程序选择器是否应在单独的部分显示内容类型的相关应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the app chooser should show the default handler for the content type in a separate section.
trans-unit.target: 设置应用程序选择器是否应该在单独的部分显示内容类型的默认处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the aspect ratio of the child's size request should override the set aspect ratio of the GtkAspectFrame.
trans-unit.target: 设置子级的大小请求的宽高比是否应覆盖GtkAspectFrame的设置的高宽比。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the audio stream should be muted. Muting a stream will cause no audio to be played, but it does not modify the volume. This means that muting and then unmuting the stream will restore the volume settings.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应将音频流静音。静音将导致不播放音频流,但不会修改音量。这意味着,静音后再取消静音将恢复音量设置。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the box layout will allocate the same size to all children.
trans-unit.target: 设置框的布局是否会给所有子代分配相同的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the calendar should show a heading containing the current year and month as well as buttons for changing both.
trans-unit.target: 设置日历是否应该显示包含当前年份和月份的标题,以及更改标题和月份的按钮。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the calendar shows day names.
trans-unit.target: 设置日历是否显示日名。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the common prefix of the possible completions should be automatically inserted in the entry.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应在条目中自动插入可能完成的共同前缀。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the completion popup window will appear even if there is only a single match. You may want to set this to FALSE if you are using inline completion.
trans-unit.target: 设置即使只有一个匹配项，是否也会显示完成弹出窗口。如果您使用内联完成，则可能需要将此设置为 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the completion popup window will be resized to be the same width as the entry.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否调整完成弹出窗口的大小,使其与条目的宽度相同。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the completions should be presented in a popup window.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应在弹出窗口中显示完成。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the contents of the entry are visible or not. When visibility is set to FALSE, characters are displayed as the invisible char, and will also appear that way when the text in the entry widget is copied elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 设置条目的内容是否可见。当可见性设置为 FALSE 时，字符将显示为不可见的字符，并且当条目小部件中的文本复制到其他位置时，字符也会以这种方式显示。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the contents of the self are visible or not. When visibility is set to FALSE, characters are displayed as the invisible char, and will also appear that way when the text in the self widget is copied to the clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 设置自身的内容是否可见。当可见性设置为 FALSE 时，字符将显示为不可见的字符，并且将self小部件中的文本复制到剪贴板时也会以这种方式显示。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the dialog should be modal.
trans-unit.target: 设置对话框是否为模态。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the directory list will monitor the directory for changes. If monitoring is enabled, the “items-changed” signal will be emitted when the directory contents change.
trans-unit.target: 设置目录列表是否将监视目录的更改。如果启用了监视，则在目录内容更改时将发出“ items-changed”（更改项目）信号。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the dropdown button of the combo box should be always sensitive (GTK_SENSITIVITY_ON), never sensitive (GTK_SENSITIVITY_OFF) or only if there is at least one item to display (GTK_SENSITIVITY_AUTO).
trans-unit.target: 设置组合框的下拉按钮是应该始终是敏感的（ GTK_SENSITIVITY_ON ），应该是不敏感的（ GTK_SENSITIVITY_OFF ）还是仅在要显示至少一项的情况下（ GTK_SENSITIVITY_AUTO ）。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the dropdown menu of this button should show an entry to trigger a GtkAppChooserDialog.
trans-unit.target: 设置此按钮的下拉菜单是否应显示触发GtkAppChooserDialog的条目。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the dropdown menu of this button should show the default application for the given content type at top.
trans-unit.target: 设置该按钮的下拉菜单是否应该在顶部显示给定内容类型的默认应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the entry has a beveled frame around it.
trans-unit.target: 设置条目周围是否有斜面框。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the entry should have a clickable icon to show the contents of the entry in clear text.
trans-unit.target: 设置条目是否应该有一个可点击的图标,以清晰的文字显示条目的内容。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the expander will resize the toplevel widget containing the expander upon resizing and collpasing.
trans-unit.target: 设置展开器是否会在调整大小和卷积时调整包含展开器的 toplevel widget 的大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the filter ignores case differences.
trans-unit.target: 设置过滤器是否忽略大小写差异。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the filter should invert the expression.
trans-unit.target: 设置过滤器是否应该反转表达式。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the given GtkCellRenderer is an expander.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定的GtkCellRenderer是否为扩展器。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the given GtkCellRenderer is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否扩展给定的GtkCellRenderer。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the hexpand flag (see gtk_widget_get_hexpand()) will be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否使用hexpand标志（请参阅 gtk_widget_get_hexpand() ）。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the icon is activatable.
trans-unit.target: 设置图标是否可以激活。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the label is in single line mode.
trans-unit.target: 设置标签是否处于单行模式。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the license text in about is automatically wrapped.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否自动换行 about 中的许可证文本。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the list box should show separators between rows.
trans-unit.target: 设置列表框是否要在行间显示分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the list should show separators between columns.
trans-unit.target: 设置列表是否要在列间显示分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the list should show separators between rows.
trans-unit.target: 设置列表是否要在行间显示分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the natural height of the child should be calculated and propagated through the scrolled window’s requested natural height.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应该计算并通过滚动窗口请求的自然高度传播孩子的自然高度。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the natural width of the child should be calculated and propagated through the scrolled window’s requested natural width.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应该计算子级的自然宽度并通过滚动窗口请求的自然宽度进行传播。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the notebook tab can be reordered via drag and drop or not.
trans-unit.target: 设置笔记本选项卡是否可以通过拖放重新排序。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the print dialog allows user to print a selection.
trans-unit.target: 设置打印对话框是否允许用户打印选区。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the progress bar will show a text in addition to the bar itself. The shown text is either the value of the “text” property or, if that is NULL, the “fraction” value, as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 设置进度条是否除了进度条本身以外还显示文本。显示的文本是“文本”属性的值，或者如果是 NULL ，则是“分数”值（以百分比表示）。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the progress bar will show text next to the bar. The shown text is either the value of the “text” property or, if that is NULL, the “fraction” value, as a percentage.
trans-unit.target: 设置进度条是否在进度条旁边显示文本。显示的文本是“文本”属性的值，或者如果是 NULL ，则是“分数”值（以百分比表示）。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the range’s slider has a fixed size, or a size that depends on its adjustment’s page size.
trans-unit.target: 设置范围的滑块是固定大小还是取决于其调整页面大小的大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the slider is restricted to the fill level. See gtk_range_set_fill_level() for a general description of the fill level concept.
trans-unit.target: 设置滑块是否限于填充水平。有关填充级别概念的一般说明，请参见 gtk_range_set_fill_level() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the sorter will ignore case differences.
trans-unit.target: 设置分拣机是否会忽略大小写差异。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the stream should loop, ie restart playback from the beginning instead of stopping at the end.
trans-unit.target: 设置流媒体是否应该循环,即从头开始重新开始播放,而不是在结束时停止。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the tab can be detached from notebook to another notebook or widget.
trans-unit.target: 设置选项卡是否可以从 notebook 分离到另一个笔记本或小部件。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the tab label area will have arrows for scrolling if there are too many tabs to fit in the area.
trans-unit.target: 设置如果标签页太多而无法容纳时,标签页标签区域是否会有滚动箭头。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the text is overwritten when typing in the GtkEntry.
trans-unit.target: 设置在键入GtkEntry时是否覆盖文本。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the text is overwritten when typing in the GtkText.
trans-unit.target: 设置在键入GtkText时是否覆盖文本。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the text of the label contains markup in Pango’s text markup language. See gtk_label_set_markup().
trans-unit.target: 设置标签文本是否包含Pango文本标记语言的标记。参见 gtk_label_set_markup() 。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the user can resize a window.
trans-unit.target: 设置用户是否可以调整窗口大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the vexpand flag (see gtk_widget_get_vexpand()) will be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否使用vexpand标志（请参阅 gtk_widget_get_vexpand() ）。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the viewport should automatically scroll to keep the focused child in view.
trans-unit.target: 设置视口是否应该自动滚动以保持焦点子代的视野。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the widget should grab focus when it is clicked with the mouse. Making mouse clicks not grab focus is useful in places like toolbars where you don’t want the keyboard focus removed from the main area of the application.
trans-unit.target: 设置在用鼠标单击小部件时是否应抓住焦点。在不希望将键盘焦点从应用程序的主要区域移开的地方，例如工具栏等，使鼠标单击不占据焦点非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the widget would like any available extra horizontal space. When a user resizes a GtkWindow, widgets with expand=TRUE generally receive the extra space. For example, a list or scrollable area or document in your window would often be set to expand.
trans-unit.target: 设置窗口小部件是否需要任何可用的额外水平空间。当用户调整GtkWindow的大小时，具有expand = TRUE的小部件通常会收到额外的空间。例如，经常将窗口中的列表或可滚动区域或文档设置为展开。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the widget would like any available extra vertical space.
trans-unit.target: 设置小组件是否需要任何可用的额外垂直空间。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the window will display a menubar for the app menu and menubar as needed.
trans-unit.target: 设置窗口是否会根据需要显示应用菜单和menubar的menubar。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether there is a selection to print.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否有选择要打印。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this column should be resizable by dragging.
trans-unit.target: 设置此列是否可以通过拖动来调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this column should be visible in views.
trans-unit.target: 设置此列在视图中是否可见。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this header bar shows the standard window title buttons including close, maximize, and minimize.
trans-unit.target: 设置该标题栏是否显示标准的窗口标题按钮,包括关闭、最大化和最小化。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this job is printed collated.
trans-unit.target: 设置此作业是否打印整理。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this job is printed reversed.
trans-unit.target: 设置该作业是否反面打印。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this job is printed rotated.
trans-unit.target: 设置该作业是否旋转打印。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether this popover should draw an arrow pointing at the widget it is relative to.
trans-unit.target: 设置该弹出式菜单是否应该画一个箭头指向它所相对的小组件。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether to clip this child.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否剪辑这个孩子。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether to draw and enable expanders and indent child rows in tree_view . When disabled there will be no expanders visible in trees and there will be no way to expand and collapse rows by default. Also note that hiding the expanders will disable the default indentation. You can set a custom indentation in this case using gtk_tree_view_set_level_indentation(). This does not have any visible effects for lists.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否在 tree_view 中绘制并启用扩展器并缩进子行。禁用此选项后，树中将看不到任何扩展器，并且默认情况下将无法扩展和折叠行。另请注意，隐藏扩展器将禁用默认缩进。在这种情况下，您可以使用 gtk_tree_view_set_level_indentation() 设置自定义缩进。这对列表没有任何可见的影响。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether to draw lines interconnecting the expanders in tree_view . This does not have any visible effects for lists.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否在 tree_view 中绘制互连扩展器的线。这对列表没有任何可见的影响。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether to measure this child.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否要测量这个孩子。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether to show the tabs for the notebook or not.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否显示笔记本的标签。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether to sort smaller numbers before larger ones.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否将较小的数字排在较大的数字之前。

trans-unit.source: Sets whether week numbers are shown in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 设置日历中是否显示周数。

trans-unit.source: Sets which grid lines to draw in tree_view .
trans-unit.target: 设置在 tree_view 中绘制哪些网格线。

trans-unit.source: Sets which row defines the global baseline for the entire grid.
trans-unit.target: 设置哪一行定义了整个网格的全局基线。

trans-unit.source: Sets which row defines the global baseline for the entire grid. Each row in the grid can have its own local baseline, but only one of those is global, meaning it will be the baseline in the parent of the grid .
trans-unit.target: 设置哪行定义整个网格的全局基线。网格中的每一行都可以有自己的局部基线，但是其中只有一个是全局基线，这意味着它将成为 grid 父级中的基线。

trans-unit.source: Sets zero or more keyboard accelerators that will trigger the given action. The first item in accels will be the primary accelerator, which may be displayed in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 设置零个或多个将触发给定操作的键盘加速器。中的第一项 accels 将主促进剂，其可以被显示在UI。

trans-unit.source: Setting “active” to TRUE will add the :checked: state to both the checkbutton and the indicator CSS node.
trans-unit.target: 将“ active”设置为 TRUE 会将 :checked: 状态添加到复选按钮和指示器CSS节点。

trans-unit.source: Setting a draw function is the main thing you want to do when using a drawing area. It is called whenever GTK needs to draw the contents of the drawing area to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 设置绘图函数是使用绘图区域时最主要的事情。每当GTK需要将绘图区域的内容绘制到屏幕上时,就会调用这个函数。

trans-unit.source: Setting a fixed width overrides the automatically calculated width. Interactive resizing also sets the “fixed-width” property.
trans-unit.target: 设置固定宽度会覆盖自动计算的宽度。交互式调整大小还会设置“固定宽度”属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting hexpand explicitly with this function will override the automatic expand behavior.
trans-unit.target: 通过该函数显式设置hexpand将覆盖自动展开行为。

trans-unit.source: Setting properties of objects is pretty straightforward with the <property> element: the “name” attribute specifies the name of the property, and the content of the element specifies the value. If the “translatable” attribute is set to a true value, GTK uses gettext() (or dgettext() if the builder has a translation domain set) to find a translation for the value. This happens before the value is parsed, so it can be used for properties of any type, but it is probably most useful for string properties. It is also possible to specify a context to disambiguate short strings, and comments which may help the translators.
trans-unit.target: 使用<property>元素设置对象的属性非常简单：“ name”属性指定属性的名称，而元素的内容指定值。如果将“ translateable”属性设置为真值，则GTK将使用 gettext() （如果构建器已设置翻译域，则使用 dgettext() ）来查找该值的翻译。这是在解析值之前发生的，因此它可以用于任何类型的属性，但对于字符串属性可能最有用。还可以指定上下文以消除短字符串和注释的歧义，这可能对翻译人员有所帮助。

trans-unit.source: Setting the "complete" property to TRUE marks a page as complete (i.e.: all the required fields are filled out). GTK uses this information to control the sensitivity of the navigation buttons.
trans-unit.target: 将“ complete”属性设置为 TRUE 会将页面标记为已完成（即，所有必填字段均已填写）。GTK使用此信息来控制导航按钮的灵敏度。

trans-unit.source: Setting the ::fixed-height-mode property to TRUE speeds up GtkTreeView by assuming that all rows have the same height. Only enable this option if all rows are the same height. Please see gtk_tree_view_set_fixed_height_mode() for more information on this option.
trans-unit.target: 将:: fixed-height-mode属性设置为 TRUE 可通过假设所有行的高度都相同来加快GtkTreeView的速度。仅当所有行的高度相同时才启用此选项。有关此选项的更多信息，请参见 gtk_tree_view_set_fixed_height_mode() 。

trans-unit.source: Setting the group of a check button also changes the css name of the indicator widget's CSS node to 'radio'.
trans-unit.target: 设置复选按钮的组也将指示器部件的CSS节点的css名称改为 "radio"。

trans-unit.source: Setting the maximum number of children per line limits the overall natural size request to be no more than n_children children long in the given orientation.
trans-unit.target: 设置每行的最大子 n_children 将限制整体自然尺寸请求，使其不超过给定方向上的n_children个子代。

trans-unit.source: Setting the minimum children per line ensures that a reasonably small height will be requested for the overall minimum width of the box.
trans-unit.target: 设置每行最小的孩子,可以确保盒子的整体最小宽度会要求一个合理的小高度。

trans-unit.source: Setting the priority while self is loading will reprioritize the ongoing load as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: 在 self 加载时设置优先级将尽快重新分配正在进行的加载的优先级。

trans-unit.source: Setting the same sequence to GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_DENIED on every other gesture group within the widget, and every gesture on parent widgets in the propagation chain.
trans-unit.target: 在小部件内的每个其他手势组以及传播链中父级小部件上的每个手势，将相同序列设置为GTK_EVENT_SEQUENCE_DENIED。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property allows finer grained reaction to an ongoing drop at the cost of loading more data.
trans-unit.target: 设置该属性可以以加载更多数据为代价,对正在进行的下跌做出更精细的反应。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is the equivalent of calling gtk_window_fullscreen() and gtk_window_unfullscreen(); either operation is asynchronous, which means you will need to connect to the “notify” signal in order to know whether the operation was successful.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性等效于调用 gtk_window_fullscreen() 和 gtk_window_unfullscreen() ; 两种操作都是异步的，这意味着您需要连接到“通知”信号才能知道操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is the equivalent of calling gtk_window_maximize() and gtk_window_unmaximize(); either operation is asynchronous, which means you will need to connect to the “notify” signal in order to know whether the operation was successful.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性等效于调用 gtk_window_maximize() 和 gtk_window_unmaximize() ; 两种操作都是异步的，这意味着您需要连接到“通知”信号才能知道操作是否成功。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property is typically used to re-establish print settings from a previous print operation, see gtk_print_operation_run().
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性通常用于从先前的打印操作中重新建立打印设置，请参见 gtk_print_operation_run() 。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to TRUE indicates that the paned needs to provide stronger visual separation (e.g. because it separates between two notebooks, whose tab rows would otherwise merge visually).
trans-unit.target: 将此属性设置为 TRUE 表示，窗格需要提供更强的视觉分隔（例如，因为它分隔了两个笔记本，否则它们的标签行将在视觉上合并）。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to FALSE also hides the text again.
trans-unit.target: 将此设置为 FALSE 也会再次隐藏文本。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to a non-NULL value overrides the system-wide IM module setting. See the GtkSettings “gtk-im-module” property.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为非 NULL 值将覆盖系统范围内的IM模块设置。请参阅GtkSettings “ gtk-im-module”属性。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to a non-negative value causes the cell renderer to enter "activity mode", where a block bounces back and forth to indicate that some progress is made, without specifying exactly how much.
trans-unit.target: 将此值设置为非负值会使单元格渲染器进入 "活动模式",在该模式下,一个块来回跳动,以表明取得了一些进展,但没有具体说明进展的程度。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to zero has the same effect as setting “gtk-cursor-blink” to FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 将其设置为零与将“ gtk-cursor-blink”设置为 FALSE 具有相同的效果。

trans-unit.source: Setting up a file chooser dialog
trans-unit.target: 设置文件选择器对话框

trans-unit.source: Setting up the content provider and icon ahead of time only makes sense when the data does not change. More commonly, you will want to set them up just in time. To do so, GtkDragSource has “prepare” and “drag-begin” signals. The ::prepare signal is emitted before a drag is started, and can be used to set the content provider and actions that the drag should be started with. The ::drag-begin signal is emitted after the GdkDrag object has been created, and can be used to set up the drag icon.
trans-unit.target: 只有在数据不变的情况下，才需要提前设置内容提供者和图标。更常见的是，您将希望及时设置它们。为此，GtkDragSource具有“ prepare”和“ drag-begin”信号。:: prepare信号在开始拖动之前发出，可用于设置内容提供程序和开始拖动的操作。创建GdkDrag对象后，将发出:: drag-begin信号，该信号可用于设置拖动图标。

trans-unit.source: Settings
trans-unit.target: Settings

trans-unit.source: Settings — Sharing settings between applications
trans-unit.target: 设置-在应用程序之间共享设置

trans-unit.source: Several different coordinate systems are exposed in the GtkTreeView API. These are:
trans-unit.target: GtkTreeView API中暴露了几种不同的坐标系。这些坐标系是:

trans-unit.source: Several environment variables are useful to pass to set before running meson. CPPFLAGS contains options to pass to the C compiler, and is used to tell the compiler where to look for include files. The LDFLAGS variable is used in a similar fashion for the linker. Finally the PKG_CONFIG_PATH environment variable contains a search path that pkg-config (see below) uses when looking for files describing how to compile programs using different libraries. If you were installing GTK and it’s dependencies into /opt/gtk, you might want to set these variables as:
trans-unit.target: 在运行介子之前，需要传递几个环境变量以进行设置。 CPPFLAGS 包含传递给C编译器的选项，并用于告诉编译器在哪里寻找包含文件。所述 LDFLAGS 变量以类似的方式对所述接头使用。最后， PKG_CONFIG_PATH 环境变量包含一个搜索路径，当查找描述如何使用不同库编译程序的文件时， pkg-config （请参见下文）将使用该搜索路径。如果要安装GTK及其依赖项到 /opt/gtk 中，则可能需要将这些变量设置为：

trans-unit.source: Several functions are available for converting between the different coordinate systems. The most common translations are between widget and bin window coordinates and between bin window and tree coordinates. For the former you can use gtk_tree_view_convert_widget_to_bin_window_coords() (and vice versa), for the latter gtk_tree_view_convert_bin_window_to_tree_coords() (and vice versa).
trans-unit.target: 有几种功能可用于在不同的坐标系之间进行转换。最常见的转换是在窗口小部件和bin窗口坐标之间以及bin窗口和树坐标之间。对于前者，您可以使用 gtk_tree_view_convert_widget_to_bin_window_coords() （反之亦然），对于后者 gtk_tree_view_convert_bin_window_to_tree_coords() （反之亦然）。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted after all pages have been rendered.
trans-unit.target: 所有页面渲染完毕后发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted after the “begin-print” signal, but before the actual rendering starts.
trans-unit.target: 在“开始打印”信号之后但在实际渲染开始之前发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted after the user has finished changing print settings in the dialog, before the actual rendering starts.
trans-unit.target: 用户在对话框中更改打印设置后,在实际渲染开始前发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted for every page that is printed.
trans-unit.target: 每打印一页都会发出信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted if keyboard navigation fails.
trans-unit.target: 键盘导航失败时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted right before “begin-print” if you added a custom widget in the “create-custom-widget” handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果在“ create-custom-widget”处理程序中添加了自定义小部件，则信号将在“ begin-print”之前发出。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when “has-tooltip” is TRUE and the hover timeout has expired with the cursor hovering “above” widget; or emitted when widget got focus in keyboard mode.
trans-unit.target: 当“ has-tooltip”为 TRUE 并且鼠标悬停在“ above”小部件上方时，悬停超时已到期时发出的信号；或当小部件在键盘模式下获得焦点时发出。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when a GtkWindow is added to application through gtk_application_add_window().
trans-unit.target: 通过 gtk_application_add_window() 将GtkWindow添加到应用程序时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when a GtkWindow is removed from application, either as a side-effect of being destroyed or explicitly through gtk_application_remove_window().
trans-unit.target: 从应用程序中删除GtkWindow时发出的信号，它是被销毁的副作用，还是通过 gtk_application_remove_window() 显式地发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when a change of focus is requested
trans-unit.target: 要求改变焦点时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when a new row has been inserted in the model.
trans-unit.target: 当模型中插入新行时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when a preview is requested from the native dialog.
trans-unit.target: 从本地对话框请求预览时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when a row has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 当某行被删除时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when a row has gotten the first child row or lost its last child row.
trans-unit.target: 当某行获得第一条子行或失去最后一条子行时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when a row in the model has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当模型中的行发生变化时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when an action widget is activated.
trans-unit.target: 激活动作部件时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when displaying the print dialog.
trans-unit.target: 显示打印对话框时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when the GdkSurface associated with widget is destroyed, which means that gtk_widget_unrealize() has been called or the widget has been unmapped (that is, it is going to be hidden).
trans-unit.target: 与小部件关联的GdkSurface销毁时发出的信号，这意味着已调用 gtk_widget_unrealize() 或取消映射了小部件（即将其隐藏）。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when the button has been activated (pressed and released).
trans-unit.target: 当按钮被激活(按下和释放)时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when the children of a node in the GtkTreeModel have been reordered.
trans-unit.target: 当GtkTreeModel中一个节点的子节点被重新排序时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when the print operation run has finished doing everything required for printing.
trans-unit.target: 当打印操作运行完成了打印所需的所有操作时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when the sort column or sort order of sortable is changed.
trans-unit.target: 当排序列或排序顺序发生变化时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when the text direction of a widget changes.
trans-unit.target: 小组件的文字方向改变时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when the user uses a keybinding to close the dialog.
trans-unit.target: 当用户使用按键绑定关闭对话框时发出的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when the widget state changes, see gtk_widget_get_state_flags().
trans-unit.target: 小部件状态更改时发出的信号，请参阅 gtk_widget_get_state_flags() 。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when widget is associated with a GdkSurface, which means that gtk_widget_realize() has been called or the widget has been mapped (that is, it is going to be drawn).
trans-unit.target: 当窗口小部件与GdkSurface关联时发出的信号，这意味着已调用 gtk_widget_realize() 或窗口小部件已映射（即将被绘制）。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when widget is going to be mapped, that is when the widget is visible (which is controlled with gtk_widget_set_visible()) and all its parents up to the toplevel widget are also visible.
trans-unit.target: 当小部件将被映射时发出的信号，即当小部件可见时（由 gtk_widget_set_visible() 控制），并且直到顶层小部件的所有父级都可见。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when widget is going to be unmapped, which means that either it or any of its parents up to the toplevel widget have been set as hidden.
trans-unit.target: 当widget将被取消映射时发出的信号,这意味着它或它的任何父节点(直到toplevel widget)已被设置为隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Signal emitted when widget is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 小部件被隐藏时发出的信号。

trans-unit.target: 小组件显示时发出的信号

trans-unit.target: 信号处理程序和函数指针

trans-unit.source: Signal handlers are set up with the <signal> element. The “name” attribute specifies the name of the signal, and the “handler” attribute specifies the function to connect to the signal. The remaining attributes, “after”, “swapped” and “object”, have the same meaning as the corresponding parameters of the g_signal_connect_object() or g_signal_connect_data() functions. A “last_modification_time” attribute is also allowed, but it does not have a meaning to the builder.
trans-unit.target: 信号处理程序是通过<signal>元素设置的。“名称”属性指定信号的名称，“处理程序”属性指定连接到信号的功能。其余属性“之后”，“交换”和“对象”具有与 g_signal_connect_object() 或 g_signal_connect_data() 函数的相应参数相同的含义。还允许使用“ last_modification_time”属性，但它对构建器没有意义。

trans-unit.source: Signal is a sign for the cell renderer to update its value from the cell_editable.
trans-unit.target: 信号是单元格渲染器从cell_editable中更新其值的标志。

trans-unit.source: Signal is emitted when the active item is changed.
trans-unit.target: 活动项目发生变化时发出信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal is meant to indicate that the cell is finished editing, and the widget may now be destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 信号表示单元格已完成编辑,现在可以销毁小组件。

trans-unit.source: Signal that causes the button to animate press then release. Applications should never connect to this signal, but use the clicked signal.
trans-unit.target: 导致按钮动画的信号按下，然后释放。应用程序永远不要连接到该信号，而应使用 clicked 信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal which allows you to change how the text displayed in a combo box’s entry is displayed.

trans-unit.source: Signalize that drawing of particular page is complete.
trans-unit.target: 标志着特定页面的绘制完成。

trans-unit.target: Signals

trans-unit.source: Signals that a new scrolling operation has finished. It will only be emitted on devices capable of it.

trans-unit.source: Signals that a parsing error occurred. the path , line and position describe the actual location of the error as accurately as possible.

trans-unit.source: Signals that all holders of a reference to the widget should release the reference that they hold. May result in finalization of the widget if all references are released.
trans-unit.target: 表示小组件引用的所有持有者应释放其持有的引用。如果所有引用都被释放,可能导致小组件的最终确定。

trans-unit.source: Signals that are used in this way are referred to as keybinding signals, and they are expected to be defined with the G_SIGNAL_ACTION flag.
trans-unit.target: 以这种方式使用的信号称为键绑定信号，并且期望使用 G_SIGNAL_ACTION 标志进行定义。

trans-unit.source: Signals that the pointer has entered the widget.

trans-unit.source: Signals that the pointer has left the widget.

trans-unit.source: Signals that the widget should scroll by the amount specified by dx and dy .

trans-unit.source: Similar to GtkMessageDialog, the contents of a GtkInfoBar can by classified as error message, warning, informational message, etc, by using gtk_info_bar_set_message_type(). GTK may use the message type to determine how the message is displayed.

trans-unit.source: Size for the opposite of orientation , i.e. if orientation is GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL, this is the height the widget should be measured with. The GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL case is analogous. This way, both height-for-width and width-for-height requests can be implemented. If no size is known, -1 can be passed.
trans-unit.target: 相反 orientation 大小，即，如果 orientation 为 GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL ，则这是应该测量小部件的高度。所述 GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL 情况下是类似的。通过这种方式，可以同时实现“高换宽”和“高换宽”请求。如果不知道大小，则可以传递-1。

trans-unit.source: Size for the opposite of orientation ; for instance, if the orientation is GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL, this is the height of the widget; if the orientation is GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL, this is the width of the widget. This allows to measure the height for the given width, and the width for the given height. Use -1 if the size is not known
trans-unit.target: 与 orientation 相反的尺寸;例如，如果 orientation 是 GTK_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL ，则这是小部件的高度；如果 orientation 是 GTK_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL ，则这是小部件的宽度。这允许测量给定宽度的高度和给定高度的宽度。如果大小未知，请使用-1

trans-unit.source: Size groups can be specified in a UI definition by placing an <object> element with class="GtkSizeGroup" somewhere in the UI definition. The widgets that belong to the size group are specified by a <widgets> element that may contain multiple <widget> elements, one for each member of the size group. The ”name” attribute gives the id of the widget.
trans-unit.target: 可以在UI定义中通过将< class="GtkSizeGroup" >元素与class =“ GtkSizeGroup”放置在UI定义中的某个位置来指定大小组。属于大小组的窗口小部件由<widgets>元素指定，该元素可能包含多个<widget>元素，大小组的每个成员一个。“名称”属性提供小部件的ID。
