trans-unit.source: So a layout container is guaranteed that its children stay inside the assigned bounds, but not that they have exactly the bounds the container assigned.
trans-unit.target: 因此,布局容器保证其子代停留在分配的边界内,但并不保证它们拥有与容器分配的边界完全一致的边界。

trans-unit.source: Some applications benefit from minimizing the amount of light pollution that interferes with the content. Good candidates for dark themes are photo and video editors that make the actual content get all the attention and minimize the distraction of the chrome.
trans-unit.target: 一些应用程序从最小化干扰内容的光污染量中受益。暗色主题的良好候选者是照片和视频编辑器,使实际内容得到所有的关注,并最大限度地减少铬的分心。

trans-unit.source: Some common sense is expected when using these flags - mixing GTK_INPUT_HINT_LOWERCASE with any of the uppercase hints makes no sense.
trans-unit.target: 使用这些标志时，需要一些常识-将 GTK_INPUT_HINT_LOWERCASE 与任何大写提示混合使用是没有意义的。

trans-unit.source: Some events, such as touch events or button press-release pairs, are connected in to each other in an “event sequence” that univocally identifies events that are related to the same interaction.
trans-unit.target: 某些事件（例如触摸事件或按钮按下/释放对）以“事件序列”彼此连接，该事件序列唯一地标识与同一交互相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: Some of the libraries that GTK depends on are maintained by the GTK team: GLib, GdkPixbuf, Pango, and GObject Introspection. Other libraries are maintained separately.
trans-unit.target: GTK所依赖的一些库是由GTK团队维护的。GLib,GdkPixbuf,Pango,和 GObject Introspection.其他的库是单独维护的。

trans-unit.source: Some problem has occurred during printing, e.g. a paper jam.
trans-unit.target: 打印过程中发生了一些问题,例如卡纸。

trans-unit.source: Some systems don't support asynchronous printing, but those that do will return GTK_PRINT_OPERATION_RESULT_IN_PROGRESS as the status, and emit the “done” signal when the operation is actually done.
trans-unit.target: 一些系统不支持异步打印，但是那些系统将返回 GTK_PRINT_OPERATION_RESULT_IN_PROGRESS 作为状态，并在实际完成操作时发出“完成”信号。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes an application will want to avoid depending on external data files, such as image files. See the documentation of GResource for details. In this case, gtk_picture_new_for_resource() and gtk_picture_set_resource() should be used.
trans-unit.target: 有时，应用程序将希望避免依赖于外部数据文件，例如图像文件。有关详细信息，请参见GResource文档。在这种情况下，应使用 gtk_picture_new_for_resource() 和 gtk_picture_set_resource() 。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes an application will want to avoid depending on external data files, such as image files. See the documentation of GResource for details. In this case, the “resource”, gtk_image_new_from_resource() and gtk_image_set_from_resource() should be used.
trans-unit.target: 有时，应用程序将希望避免依赖于外部数据文件，例如图像文件。有关详细信息，请参见GResource文档。在这种情况下，应使用“ resource”， gtk_image_new_from_resource() 和 gtk_image_set_from_resource() 。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is necessary to refer to widgets which have implicitly been constructed by GTK as part of a composite widget, to set properties on them or to add further children (e.g. the content area of a GtkDialog). This can be achieved by setting the “internal-child” property of the <child> element to a true value. Note that GtkBuilder still requires an <object> element for the internal child, even if it has already been constructed.
trans-unit.target: 有时有必要将GTK隐式构造的小部件作为复合小部件的一部分进行引用，以在其上设置属性或添加其他子级（例如GtkDialog的内容区域）。这可以通过将 <child> 元素的“ internal-child”属性设置为真实值来实现。注意，即使内部子项已经构造，GtkBuilder仍然需要一个 <object> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Sort direction the sort indicator should indicate.
trans-unit.target: 排序指标应该指示的排序方向。

trans-unit.source: Sorter for sorting items according to this column
trans-unit.target: 分拣机,用于根据此列对项目进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Sorter with the sorting choices of the user
trans-unit.target: 分拣机,可由用户选择排序。

trans-unit.source: Sorters implement a partial order:
trans-unit.target: 分拣器实现了部分顺序。

trans-unit.source: Sorters may change their sorting behavior through their lifetime. In that case, they will emit the “changed” signal to notify that the sort order is no longer valid and should be updated by calling gtk_sorter_compare() again.
trans-unit.target: 分类器可能会在其整个生命周期内更改其分类行为。在这种情况下，它们将发出“ changed”信号来通知排序顺序不再有效，应通过再次调用 gtk_sorter_compare() 进行更新。

trans-unit.source: Sorting is in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: 排序方式为升序。

trans-unit.source: Sorting is in descending order.
trans-unit.target: 排序方式为降序。

trans-unit.source: Space which is inserted between cells.
trans-unit.target: 在单元格之间插入的空间。

trans-unit.source: Special Usage
trans-unit.target: 特殊用途

trans-unit.source: Special XML characters in the printf() arguments passed to this function will automatically be escaped as necessary. (See g_markup_printf_escaped() for how this is implemented.) Usually this is what you want, but if you have an existing Pango markup string that you want to use literally as the label, then you need to use gtk_message_dialog_set_markup() instead, since you can’t pass the markup string either as the format (it might contain “%” characters) or as a string argument.
trans-unit.target: 传递给此函数的 printf() 参数中的特殊XML字符将根据需要自动转义。 （见 g_markup_printf_escaped() 这是如何实现的。）通常这是你想要的，但如果你有一个现有的攀高标记字符串要字面上使用的标签，那么你需要使用 gtk_message_dialog_set_markup() 代替，因为你无法以格式（可能包含“％”字符）或字符串参数的形式传递标记字符串。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of directories to search when GTK is looking for dynamically loaded objects such as input method modules and print backends. If the path to the dynamically loaded object is given as an absolute path name, then GTK loads it directly. Otherwise, GTK goes in turn through the directories in GTK_PATH, followed by the directory .gtk-4.0 in the user’s home directory, followed by the system default directory, which is libdir/gtk-4.0/modules. (If GTK_EXE_PREFIX is defined, libdir is $GTK_EXE_PREFIX/lib. Otherwise it is the libdir specified when GTK was configured, usually /usr/lib, or /usr/local/lib.)
trans-unit.target: 指定当GTK寻找动态加载的对象（例如输入法模块和打印后端）时要搜索的目录列表。如果动态加载对象的路径是绝对路径名，则GTK会直接加载它。否则，GTK去又通过目录 GTK_PATH ，其次是目录 .gtk-4.0 在用户的主目录，其次是系统默认的目录，这是 libdir/gtk-4.0/modules 。 （如果 GTK_EXE_PREFIX 被定义， libdir 是 $GTK_EXE_PREFIX/lib ，否则它是指定的LIBDIR时GTK被配置，通常是 /usr/lib 中，或 /usr/local/lib ）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a preference for height-for-width or width-for-height geometry management.
trans-unit.target: 指定高度换宽度或宽度换高度的几何管理偏好。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an IM module to use in preference to the one determined from the locale. If this isn’t set and you are running on the system that enables XSETTINGS and has a value in Gtk/IMModule, that will be used for the default IM module. This also can be a colon-separated list of input-methods, which GTK will try in turn until it finds one available on the system.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个IM模块，该模块优先于从语言环境确定的模块使用。如果未设置此项，并且您正在启用 XSETTINGS 并且在 Gtk/IMModule 中具有值的系统上运行，它将用于默认的IM模块。这也可以是冒号分隔的输入法列表，GTK将依次尝试输入法，直到找到系统上可用的方法为止。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how search strings are matched inside text.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何在文本中匹配搜索字符串。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to align the lines of text with respect to each other.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何使文本的行与行之间相互对齐。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to break the string into multiple lines, if the cell renderer does not have enough room to display the entire string. This property has no effect unless the wrap-width property is set.
trans-unit.target: 指定在单元格渲染器没有足够空间显示整个字符串时,如何将字符串分成多行。除非设置了wrap-width属性,否则此属性没有效果。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Broadway display number. The default display is 0. The display number determines the port to use when connecting to a Broadway application via the following formula: port = 8080 + display
trans-unit.target: 指定百老汇显示号。默认显示为0。显示编号确定通过以下公式连接到Broadway应用程序时要使用的端口： port = 8080 + display

trans-unit.source: Specifies the file listing the GdkPixbuf loader modules to load. This environment variable overrides the default value libdir/gtk-4.0/4.0.0/loaders.cache (libdir is the sysconfdir specified when GTK was configured, usually /usr/lib.)
trans-unit.target: 指定列出要加载的GdkPixbuf加载程序模块的文件。此环境变量将覆盖默认值 libdir/gtk-4.0/4.0.0/loaders.cache （ libdir 是配置GTK时指定的sysconfdir，通常是 /usr/lib 。）

trans-unit.source: Specifies the minimum width at which the text is wrapped. The wrap-mode property can be used to influence at what character positions the line breaks can be placed. Setting wrap-width to -1 turns wrapping off.
trans-unit.target: 指定文本被包裹的最小宽度。wrap-mode 属性可以用来影响换行符的位置。将 wrap-width 设置为-1,则会关闭包装。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the model column which holds the possible values for the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 指定模型列,用于存放组合框的可能值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the Wayland display to use. Typically, wayland-0 or wayland-1.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的Wayland显示器的名称。通常,wayland-0或wayland-1。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the action with which this widget should be associated. If action_name is NULL then the widget will be unassociated from any previous action.
trans-unit.target: 指定与此小部件应关联的操作的名称。如果 action_name 为 NULL ,则该小部件将与任何先前的动作无关。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the preferred place to ellipsize the string, if the cell renderer does not have enough room to display the entire string. Setting it to PANGO_ELLIPSIZE_NONE turns off ellipsizing. See the wrap-width property for another way of making the text fit into a given width.
trans-unit.target: 如果单元格渲染器没有足够的空间显示整个字符串，则指定省略字符串的首选位置。将其设置为 PANGO_ELLIPSIZE_NONE 将关闭椭圆化。有关使文本适合给定宽度的另一种方法，请参见wrap-width属性。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the side of the entry at which an icon is placed.
trans-unit.target: 指定放置图标的条目边。

trans-unit.source: Specifies what backend to load for GtkMediaFile. The possible values depend on what options GTK was built with, and can include “gstreamer”, “ffmpeg” and “none”. If set to “none”, media playback will be unavailable. The special value “help” can be used to obtain a list of all supported media backends.
trans-unit.target: 指定要为GtkMediaFile加载的后端。可能的值取决于GTK生成了哪些选项，并且可以包括“ gstreamer”，“ ffmpeg”和“ none”。如果设置为“ none”，则媒体播放将不可用。特殊值“ help”可用于获取所有支持的媒体后端的列表。

trans-unit.source: Specifies where to drop, relative to the item
trans-unit.target: 指定相对于物品的下落位置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether widget can own the input focus.
trans-unit.target: 指定 widget 是否可以拥有输入焦点。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether widget will be treated as the default widget within its toplevel when it has the focus, even if another widget is the default.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否 widget 将被视为当它具有焦点的顶层内的默认控件，即使另一个部件是默认的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the current value is displayed as a string next to the slider.
trans-unit.target: 指定当前值是否以字符串形式显示在滑块旁边。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the icon should appear sensitive or insensitive
trans-unit.target: 指定图标是否应该显示为敏感或不敏感。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the input focus can enter the widget or any of its children.
trans-unit.target: 指定输入焦点是否可以进入小组件或其任何子节点。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the popup’s width should be a fixed width matching the allocated width of the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 指定弹出窗口的宽度是否应为与组合框分配的宽度匹配的固定宽度。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to drop before, after or into the row
trans-unit.target: 指定在行前、行后还是行内投放。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which corner a child widget should be placed in when packed into a GtkScrolledWindow. This is effectively the opposite of where the scroll bars are placed.
trans-unit.target: 指定打包到GtkScrolledWindow中时应将子小部件放置在哪个角。实际上，这与滚动条的放置位置相反。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the same context for a handful of cells lets the underlying area synchronize the geometry for those cells, in this way alignments with cellviews for other rows are possible.
trans-unit.target: 为少数单元格指定相同的上下文,可以让底层区域同步这些单元格的几何形状,通过这种方式,可以与其他行的单元格视图对齐。

trans-unit.source: Stack.
trans-unit.target: Stack.

trans-unit.source: Standard Enumerations
trans-unit.target: 标准列举

trans-unit.source: Standard Enumerations — Public enumerated types used throughout GTK
trans-unit.target: 标准枚举-GTK中使用的公共枚举类型

trans-unit.source: Standard GTK controls implement the GtkAccessible interface and are thus accessible to ATs by default. This means that if you use GTK controls such as GtkButton, GtkEntry, or GtkListView, you only need to supply application-specific details when the defaults values are incomplete. You can do this by setting the appropriate properties in your GtkBuilder template and UI definition files, or by setting the properties defined by the GtkAccessible interface.
trans-unit.target: 标准的GTK控件实现了GtkAccessible接口，因此默认情况下AT可以访问它们。这意味着，如果你使用GTK控件，如GtkButton上，GtkEntry中，或GtkListView，你只需要提供应用程序的具体细节时，默认的值是不完整的。您可以通过在GtkBuilder模板和UI定义文件中设置适当的属性，或通过设置由GtkAccessible接口定义的属性来执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: Standards are another important resource if you’re poking in low-level X11 details, in particular the ICCCM and the Extended Window Manager Hints specifications. freedesktop.org has links to many relevant specifications.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要了解低级的X11详细信息，尤其是ICCCM和扩展窗口管理器提示规范，则标准是另一个重要资源。freedesktop.org包含许多相关规范的链接。

trans-unit.source: Standards are another important resource if you’re poking in low-level X11 details, in particular the ICCCM and the Extended Window Manager Hints specifications. freedesktop.org has links to many relevant specifications.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要了解低级的X11详细信息，尤其是ICCCM和扩展窗口管理器提示规范，则标准是另一个重要资源。freedesktop.org包含许多相关规范的链接。

trans-unit.source: Start a seek operation on self to timestamp . If timestamp is out of range, it will be clamped.
trans-unit.target: 对 self 进行搜索以建立 timestamp 。如果 timestamp 超出范围，它将被钳位。

trans-unit.source: Start to print without showing the print dialog, based on the current print settings.
trans-unit.target: 根据当前的打印设置,在不显示打印对话框的情况下开始打印。

trans-unit.source: Starts editing the contents of this cell , through a new GtkCellEditable widget created by the GtkCellRendererClass.start_editing virtual function.
trans-unit.target: 通过GtkCellRendererClass.start_editing虚拟函数创建的新GtkCellEditable小部件，开始编辑此 cell 的内容。

trans-unit.source: Starts loading the texture in the background so it is ready when later needed.
trans-unit.target: 开始在背景中加载纹理,以便以后需要时可以使用。

trans-unit.source: Starts or pauses playback of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 开始或暂停播放流媒体。

trans-unit.source: Starts playing the stream. If the stream is in error or already playing, do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 开始播放该流。如果流出现错误或已经在播放,则什么也不要做。

trans-unit.source: Starts the animation of the spinner.
trans-unit.target: 开始播放旋转器的动画。

trans-unit.source: Startup notification identifiers are used by desktop environment to track application startup, to provide user feedback and other features. This function changes the corresponding property on the underlying GdkSurface. Normally, startup identifier is managed automatically and you should only use this function in special cases like transferring focus from other processes. You should use this function before calling gtk_window_present() or any equivalent function generating a window map event.
trans-unit.target: 桌面环境使用启动通知标识符来跟踪应用程序启动，以提供用户反馈和其他功能。此函数更改基础GdkSurface上的相应属性。通常，启动标识符是自动管理的，您仅应在特殊情况下使用此功能，例如从其他进程转移焦点。在调用 gtk_window_present() 或生成窗口映射事件的任何等效函数之前，应使用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Stateful actions are used to represent an action which has a closely-associated state of some kind. A good example is a “fullscreen” action. For this case, you would expect to see a checkmark next to the menu item when the fullscreen option is active. This is usually called a toggle action, and it has a boolean state. By convention, toggle actions have no parameter type for activation: activating the action always toggles the state.
trans-unit.target: 有状态动作用于表示具有某种紧密关联状态的动作。一个很好的例子是“全屏”操作。对于这种情况，您希望在全屏选项处于活动状态时在菜单项旁边看到一个对勾。这通常称为切换动作，它具有布尔状态。按照惯例，切换动作没有用于激活的参数类型：激活动作始终会切换状态。

trans-unit.target: 序列的状态

trans-unit.source: Status bars are created using gtk_statusbar_new().
trans-unit.target: 使用 gtk_statusbar_new() 创建状态栏。

trans-unit.source: Status bars in GTK+ maintain a stack of messages. The message at the top of the each bar’s stack is the one that will currently be displayed.
trans-unit.target: GTK +中的状态栏维护一堆消息。每个条形堆栈顶部的消息是当前将显示的消息。

trans-unit.target: 停止在.ui文件中设置::has-default和::has-focus。

trans-unit.source: Style Classes

trans-unit.source: Style classes that are typically used with the main CSS node are .csd (when client-side decorations are in use), .solid-csd (for client-side decorations without invisible borders), .ssd (used by mutter when rendering server-side decorations). GtkWindow also represents window states with the following style classes on the main node: .tiled, .maximized, .fullscreen. Specialized types of window often add their own discriminating style classes, such as .popup or .tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 通常与主CSS节点一起使用的样式类有:.csd(在使用客户端装饰时)、.solid-csd(用于客户端装饰,没有不可见的边框)、.ssd(在渲染服务器端装饰时由mutter使用)。GtkWindow还在主节点上用以下样式类来表示窗口状态:.tiled、.maximized、.fullscreen。特殊类型的窗口通常会添加自己的辨别样式类,如.popup或.tooltip。

trans-unit.source: Swaps the value of first and second if second comes before first in the buffer. That is, ensures that first and second are in sequence. Most text buffer functions that take a range call this automatically on your behalf, so there’s no real reason to call it yourself in those cases. There are some exceptions, such as gtk_text_iter_in_range(), that expect a pre-sorted range.
trans-unit.target: 如果 second 在缓冲区中的 first 之前，则交换 first 和 second 的值。即，确保 first 和 second 顺序。大多数带有范围的文本缓冲区函数都会自动代表您调用此函数，因此在这种情况下没有真正的理由自行调用它。有一些例外，例如 gtk_text_iter_in_range() ，它们期望预先排序的范围。

trans-unit.source: Symbolic icons from the icon theme are recolored according to the -gtk-icon-palette property, which defines a list of named colors. The default palette maps these three names to symbolic colors with the names error_color, warning_color and success_color respectively. The syntax for defining a custom palette is a comma-separated list of name-color pairs, e.g.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two iterators are equal, using the fastest possible mechanism. This function is very fast; you can expect it to perform better than e.g. getting the character offset for each iterator and comparing the offsets yourself. Also, it’s a bit faster than gtk_text_iter_compare().
trans-unit.target: 使用最快的机制测试两个迭代器是否相等。这个功能非常快；您可以期望它比例如获得每个迭代器的字符偏移量和自己比较偏移量更好。而且，它比 gtk_text_iter_compare() 快一点。

trans-unit.source: Text Widget Overview
trans-unit.target: 文本小工具概述

trans-unit.source: Text buffer object which actually stores entry text.
trans-unit.target: 文本缓冲区对象,实际存储入口文本。

trans-unit.source: Text buffer object which actually stores self text.
trans-unit.target: 文本缓冲区对象,实际上是存储自我文本。

trans-unit.source: Text buffers always contain at least one line, but may be empty (that is, buffers can contain zero characters). The last line in the text buffer never ends in a line separator (such as newline); the other lines in the buffer always end in a line separator. Line separators count as characters when computing character counts and character offsets. Note that some Unicode line separators are represented with multiple bytes in UTF-8, and the two-character sequence “” is also considered a line separator.
trans-unit.target: 文本缓冲区始终至少包含一行，但可以为空（也就是说，缓冲区可以包含零个字符）。文本缓冲区中的最后一行永远不会以行分隔符（例如换行符）结尾；缓冲区中的其他行始终以行分隔符结尾。在计算字符数和字符偏移量时，行分隔符被视为字符。请注意，某些Unicode行分隔符在UTF-8中用多个字节表示，并且两个字符的序列“”也被视为行分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Text buffers support undo and redo if gtk_text_buffer_set_enable_undo() has been set to TRUE. Use gtk_text_buffer_undo() or gtk_text_buffer_redo() to perform the necessary action. Note that these operations are ignored if the buffer is not editable. Developers may want some operations to not be undoable. To do this, wrap your changes in gtk_text_buffer_begin_irreversible_action() and gtk_text_buffer_end_irreversible_action().
trans-unit.target: 如果 gtk_text_buffer_set_enable_undo() 已设置为 TRUE ,则文本缓冲区支持撤消和重做。使用 gtk_text_buffer_undo() 或 gtk_text_buffer_redo() 执行必要的操作。请注意，如果缓冲区不可编辑，则将忽略这些操作。开发人员可能希望某些操作不可撤销。为此，请将您的更改包装在 gtk_text_buffer_begin_irreversible_action() 和 gtk_text_buffer_end_irreversible_action() 中。
